attributes.additional_details: Because it is a countryside tradition and although the killing of foxes banned still an event for horse owners and hunt staff for horses and hounds millions of hound will be euthanised over no foxes as the hunts now follow a trail no smokescreen.
attributes.background: Stop the threat of trail hunting

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition, which calls for the same action: "Stop the ban on trail hunting" https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/755123
